transArray.content: I stayed here for 10 days and the overall feeling is very good. This is the most comfortable stay I have had recently. I live on the third floor. The room staff are attentive, warm and considerate, and are always available when I call. The service staff in the restaurant take great care and are dedicated to their duties. Every time I go to eat in the morning, they are particularly enthusiastic and the service is attentive. What makes me feel particularly considerate is that the restaurant service staff take care of everyone's eating habits and make dining particularly enjoyable.

Hello dear guest! Thank you for your recognition of the service attitude of our friends at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Your encouragement is very important. If life is a journey, we are willing to be your warmest stop. If meeting is a ballad, we are willing to be your wisp. Happy note, I want you to write your mood in notes. Friends, I look forward to meeting you next time at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. I wish you a happy holiday! General Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
